pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Rcpp' Bindings for the 'CCTZ' Library // 'Rcpp' Access to the 'CCTZ' timezone library is provided. 'CCTZ' is a C++ library for translating between absolute and civil times using the rules of a time zone. The 'CCTZ' source code, released under the Apache 2.0 License, is included in this package. See https://github.com/google/cctz for more details.
